channel.title: Are we aloud to post downloads of neopets?
channel.description: i hope this is in the right spot :| :D are we alound to post downloads in this section of the forums? btw plz dont warn me or nuthing kinda cus im not to sure were to post this... becase its 50% 50% its gona get moved... ether to questions or neopets. so yea.. becase i got like a tun of programes and id like to post them and it would be my first time posting programes:) with out virus scans lol... but plz o plz trust me i dont even know how to post a virus scan if u show me how than i will..:)

item.title: Are we aloud to post downloads of neopets?
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

you can use http://virusscan.jotti.org/ but it kind of defeats the purpose if you scan it, u have to let someone else scan it. As far as i know, as long as you get a mod to approve it, posting download links is ok.

Read full topic
